title: Bluenose Paradox
description: Bluenose Paradox: a collection of 10 short stories from great Canadian authors such as Valerie Gent, Megan Milner, Randi Livingstone, Larry Gent, Leanne Chatham-Milo, and Alison House! Released at Hal-Con 2013, this collection highlights the work by authors involved with the convention and gives them the chance to prove they know their sci-fi, fantasy, and horror! Edited by fan-favorite author Larry Gent and Valerie Gent, Bluenose Paradox promises to excite and intrigue!
author: Larry Gent
